title: Intro to Custom API Actions
description: Sometimes a connector doesnâ€™t meet your needs because of a missing action. With the Custom API Action method, you can get around this limitation by making a generic HTTP request to any of the connectors that Workflows has available. This sample flow uses a custom 'Role' attribute as part of Okta user profile. If the user is created with a 'Support' role attribute, the user is added to the HELP_DESK_ADMIN role in Okta.
